members.name: Alan Dershowitz
members.summary: Harvard Law professor; Epstein defense attorney. Victim testimony: oral sex allegation. FBI positive case hit. Epstein coached his defense. Cellmate interview. Tier 6 â€” Active Collaborator.

members.name: Lesley Groff
members.summary: Epstein's executive assistant. 28,757 emails â€” second only to Epstein. Operational backbone: coordinated all visits, travel, scheduling. 30,930 recovered documents. Tier 6 â€” Active Collaborator.

members.name: Prince Andrew
members.summary: Duke of York. FBI positive case hit. Victim testimony: directed to have sex with Andrew. 992 emails. Maxwell admitted Andrew met victim at her house. Settled civil suit. Tier 6 â€” Active Collaborator.

members.name: Glenn Dubin
members.summary: Hedge fund billionaire. FBI positive case hit. Victim testimony: named directly as sex partner. 1,103 emails. Cellmate interview list. Tier 6 â€” Active Collaborator.

members.name: Jean-Luc Brunel
members.summary: French modeling agent. Indicted (2020, France). Died in custody Feb 2022. FBI documented MC2 as sex trafficking front. Principal supplier of underage girls. Tier 7 â€” Co-Conspirator.

members.name: Sarah Kellen
members.summary: Named co-conspirator in federal investigations. Epstein's primary scheduler â€” 937 emails. Granted immunity in 2008 NPA. Tier 7 â€” Co-Conspirator.

members.name: Bill Clinton
members.summary: 42nd President. Sworn testimony: helicopter to Little St. James. Cellmate interview reference. FBI informant: Clinton on Epstein's plane with underage girls (hearsay). 488 emails. Tier 5.

members.name: Hillary Clinton
members.summary: Former Secretary of State. Named on DOJ Section 3 list. Referenced in defense strategy. No direct personal communications with Epstein found. Tier 3 â€” Aware.

members.name: Chelsea Clinton
members.summary: Named on DOJ Section 3 list. Father's extensive Epstein connection documented. Maxwell described as close to the Clinton family. Tier 3 â€” Aware.

members.name: Donald Trump
members.summary: 45th/47th President. FBI: one identified victim claimed abuse by Trump. FBI complaint intake: rape allegation at age 13. Message pads: called Epstein's Palm Beach mansion. Victim recruited at Mar-a-Lago. 676 docs. Tier 5.

members.name: Ehud Barak
members.summary: Former Israeli PM. Victim testimony: directed to have sex with Barak at Epstein's Palm Beach house. Named in sworn testimony (EFTA00206173). Off-the-record dinner with Clinton/Bannon. Tier 5.

members.name: Bill Richardson
members.summary: Governor of New Mexico (deceased). Named directly in victim sworn testimony as person she was directed to have sex with. Zorro Ranch in his state. 300 recovered documents. Tier 5.

members.name: George Mitchell
members.summary: Former Senate Majority Leader. Named directly in victim sworn testimony as senator she was directed to have sex with (EFTA00206173). Tier 5.

members.name: Kathy Ruemmler
members.summary: Obama White House Counsel, later Goldman Sachs GC. 985 emails to Epstein. Sent bullet points to discredit Virginia Giuffre. Proposed for off-the-record Clinton-Bannon dinner. Tier 5.

members.name: David Copperfield
members.summary: Illusionist. FBI positive case hit. Named in message pads from Epstein's home alongside Trump, Weinstein. Attorney considered deposing Copperfield. Tier 5.

members.name: Jes Staley
members.summary: Former JPMorgan/Barclays CEO. 583 emails to Epstein. FBI positive case hit. Gates DAF $100M proposal. JPMorgan paid $365M in Epstein settlements. Left Barclays 2021. Tier 5.

members.name: Harvey Weinstein
members.summary: Former film producer. Convicted sex trafficker (2020). FBI positive case hit. Named in message pads from Epstein's home. Referenced in crisis PR emails. Tier 5.

members.name: Bill Gates
members.summary: Microsoft co-founder. FBI no hit but extensive post-conviction engagement. Gates DAF â€” Epstein designed $100M philanthropy vehicle. 798 recovered documents. Tier 4 â€” Enabler.

members.name: Boris Nikolic
members.summary: Gates' chief science advisor. 1,624 emails to Epstein. Named successor executor in Epstein's will. Covert coordination with Gates via blind carbon copies. 2,379 co-occurrence docs. Tier 4.

members.name: Tom Pritzker
members.summary: Hyatt Hotels billionaire. Epstein arranged meetings: Gates to Black at Apollo. Forwarded Barak/Clinton intel articles to Epstein. Israeli defense discussions. Post-conviction engagement. Tier 4.

members.name: Joi Ito
members.summary: MIT Media Lab Director. 902 emails in Epstein network. Accepted post-conviction funding for MIT. Internal MIT review found violations. Resigned 2019. 2,045 mentions. Tier 4.

members.name: Deepak Chopra
members.summary: Author/wellness guru. 625 emails to Epstein. Regular visits to 71st Street through August 2018, less than 1 year before arrest. Visits coordinated through Groff. Tier 4.

members.name: Peggy Siegal
members.summary: NYC PR/party planner. Social rehabilitation of Epstein post-conviction. Connected Epstein to Hollywood fundraisers. Emailed Barr about charity events. Tier 4.

members.name: Mike Sitrick
members.summary: Crisis PR specialist. Coordinated media response with Epstein's legal team. Drafted statement denying pedophilia allegations. Tier 4.

members.name: David Boies
members.summary: Attorney. Represented victims but also had complex relationship with Epstein network. Named on DOJ Section 3 list. Connected to multiple investigations. Tier 4.

members.name: Ken Starr
members.summary: Special prosecutor (Clinton investigation), later Epstein defense attorney. Represented Epstein in plea negotiations. Epstein name-dropped alongside Clinton. Died 2022. Tier 4.

members.name: Darren Indyke
members.summary: Epstein's personal attorney. $250,000 wire transfer in single QuickBooks entry. Co-executor of Epstein's estate. Estate refuses to share records with FBI. Tier 4.

members.name: Richard Kahn
members.summary: Financial manager. 6,328 emails â€” 3rd most in entire Epstein network. Managed finances, coordinated with Groff on all financial operations. Tier 4.

members.name: Noam Chomsky
members.summary: MIT linguist/activist. Met with Epstein multiple times post-conviction. Confirmed meetings about political and academic matters. Scheduling emails. Tier 3.

members.name: Woody Allen
members.summary: Film director. 63 novel hits in deep sweep. Known social relationship with Epstein. Dinner meetings documented. No victim testimony naming Allen. Tier 3.

members.name: Tony Blair
members.summary: Former UK Prime Minister. Cellmate interview reference (exculpatory re: one allegation but confirms Blair in Epstein context). Clinton-Blair connection. Tier 3.

members.name: Michael Wolff
members.summary: Author of Fire and Fury. Received forward from Epstein re: NY Magazine fact-checking. Close enough for Epstein to share sensitive media inquiries. Tier 3.

members.name: Eva Dubin
members.summary: Glenn Dubin's wife. 956 emails in Epstein network. Epstein reportedly paid for her medical school. 30-year relationship with Epstein. Tier 3.

members.name: Sarah Ferguson
members.summary: Duchess of York. Named on DOJ Section 3 list. Prince Andrew's ex-wife. Social connection to Epstein through Andrew. Tier 3.

members.name: Naomi Campbell
members.summary: Supermodel. FBI positive case hit list â€” named alongside Trump, Andrew, Black, Wexner. Modeling industry connection. 38 novel hits. Tier 3.

members.name: Chris Tucker
members.summary: Actor/comedian. FBI positive case hit list. USVI shell corporation references Tucker alongside Prince Andrew and Little St. James. Tier 3.

members.name: Larry Summers
members.summary: Former Treasury Secretary and Harvard President. FBI positive case hit list (no case match). Harvard Epstein donations controversy. Tier 3.

members.name: Rahm Emmanuel
members.summary: Obama Chief of Staff, later Ambassador to Japan. Named on DOJ Section 3 list. No specific Epstein communications found. Tier 3.

members.name: Barry Diller

members.name: Reid Hoffman
members.summary: LinkedIn founder. FBI no hit list. Apologized publicly for Epstein association. Tier 3.
